item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series! This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is:   Ladder 133 Sports Bar and Grill in Smith Hill ( http://ladder133.com/)

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll likely be wearing a blue plaid shirt
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Ladder 133 Sports Bar and Grill
